about_the_game:
Master the maze, race the clock, and tilt your way to victory! In Tiltality, you control a maze to guide your ball to the finish flag. Precision and timing are key as you tackle increasingly challenging levels.


Unlock New Levels
Guide your ball to the finish flag and earn flags by beating challenging levels. Collect enough flags to unlock even more stages and keep the adventure going.


Climb the Leaderboards
Compete against players from around the globe. Every level features leaderboards so you can prove your skill and see how you stack up against the best.


Create and Share
Unleash your creativity with the level builder. Design your own levels, share them with the community, and discover top-rated creations from other players.

Master the maze, race the clock, and tilt your way to victory! In Tiltality, you control a maze to guide your ball to the finish flag. Precision and timing are key as you tackle increasingly challenging levels.


Unlock New Levels
Guide your ball to the finish flag and earn flags by beating challenging levels. Collect enough flags to unlock even more stages and keep the adventure going.

Create and Share

name: Tiltality

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Requires a basic graphics card integrated into the processor (e.g., Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent).
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card compatible with DirectX
  • VR Support: None
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card not necessary but recommended for improved performance (e.g., NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon R7 260X).
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card or better, with optional surround sound support
  • VR Support: None

short_description: Master the maze, race the clock, and tilt your way to victory! In Tiltality, you control a maze to guide your ball to the finish flag. Precision and timing are key as you tackle increasingly challenging levels.
